var Campaign_Row = skuid.model.getModel("Campaign").getFirstRow();

var CampMembers = skuid.model.getModel("Contact_Selected");

    CampMember_Id.push(row.ContactId);
});

records= checkBatchRunningRecords.getArray("records"); 

if(records.length>0){ 
window.alert("There is already an email batch running. Please wait for it to complete."); 
} 
else{ 
//window.alert('The Integration batch job has started.'); 
var batchid=sforce.apex.execute("GL_create_list_email","WebService_run_batch",{Camp_param:Camp_Id, CM_list_param:CampMember_Id}); 
}

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="Mass_Update" cachelocation="false">var $ = skuid.$;
var selectedItems = arguments[0].rows;
var CM_Account = [];
var NDA_Status_bool       = false;
var Template_Status_bool  = false;
var Portfolio_Status_bool = false;

const Mass_Update_CM     = skuid.model.getModel("Mass_Update_CM");
const Mass_Update_CM_Row = Mass_Update_CM.getFirstRow();

const CM_Contact     = skuid.model.getModel("Campaign_Member_Contact");
const CM_cond        = CM_Contact.getConditionByName('Account__c', true);

//variable of comparison
var NDAStatus_value        = selectedItems[0].minNDAStatusc;
var TemplateStatus_value   = selectedItems[0].minTemplateStatusc;
var PortfolioStatus_value  = selectedItems[0].minPortfolioStatusc;

$.each(selectedItems, function (i, item) {
    CM_Account.push(selectedItems[i].companyOrAccount);

    if(selectedItems[i].minNDAStatusc != NDAStatus_value){
            console.log('not the same NDA status');
            NDA_Status_bool = true;
            Mass_Update_CM.updateRow(Mass_Update_CM_Row,{NDAStatus: ''}); 
        }
    if(selectedItems[i].minTemplateStatusc != TemplateStatus_value){
            console.log('not the same Template status');
            Template_Status_bool = true;
            Mass_Update_CM.updateRow(Mass_Update_CM_Row,{TemplateStatus: ''}); 
        }
    if(selectedItems[i].minPortfolioStatusc != PortfolioStatus_value){
            console.log('not the same Portfolio status');
            Portfolio_Status_bool = true;
            Mass_Update_CM.updateRow(Mass_Update_CM_Row,{PortfolioStatus: ''});
        }
});

if(NDA_Status_bool == false){
    Mass_Update_CM.updateRow(Mass_Update_CM_Row,{NDAStatus: NDAStatus_value}); 
}
if(Template_Status_bool == false){
    Mass_Update_CM.updateRow(Mass_Update_CM_Row,{TemplateStatus: TemplateStatus_value}); 
}
if(Portfolio_Status_bool == false){
    Mass_Update_CM.updateRow(Mass_Update_CM_Row,{PortfolioStatus: PortfolioStatus_value}); 
}

Mass_Update_CM.save();

CM_Contact.setCondition(CM_cond, CM_Account);
CM_Contact.updateData();

const params = arguments[0];
var selectedItems = arguments[0].rows;

const Contact_Selected = skuid.model.getModel("Contact_Selected");

$.each(selectedItems, function (i, item) {

    console.log('--------------');
    console.log(selectedItems[i].Contact.Email);
    Contact_Selected.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    {field: 'ContactId', value: selectedItems[i].Id}
                    ]
            });

Contact_Selected.save();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SendEmail" cachelocation="false">var $ = skuid.$;
const params = arguments[0];

//Declare Models
var Campaign_Row = skuid.model.getModel("CampaignMember_Contact").getFirstRow();
var Camp_Id = Campaign_Row.Campaign.Id;

console.log(Camp_Id);

var CampMembers = skuid.model.getModel("Contact_Selected");
var CampMember_Id =  [];

$.each(CampMembers.data, function (i, row) {
    CampMember_Id.push(row.ContactId);
});

console.log(CampMember_Id);

//Run WSDL
var apexClassArray= sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id FROM ApexClass WHERE Name ='GL_create_list_email'"); 

recordsclassid= apexClassArray.getArray("records"); 

var checkBatchRunningRecords= sforce.connection.query("SELECT ApexClassId, status FROM AsyncApexJob WHERE ApexClassId ='"+recordsclassid[0].Id+"' AND Status NOT IN ('Completed','Aborted','Failed')"); 

records= checkBatchRunningRecords.getArray("records"); 

if(records.length>0){ 
window.alert("There is already an email batch running. Please wait for it to complete."); 
} 
else{ 
//window.alert('The Integration batch job has started.'); 
var batchid=sforce.apex.execute("GL_create_list_email","WebService_run_batch",{Camp_param:Camp_Id, CM_list_param:CampMember_Id}); 
}
</jsitem></javascript><css/><actionsequences/></resources><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/></styles></skuid__page>
